ModMetaData.name: DOOM - Factions (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Chicken Plucker
ModMetaData.description:
Update of Chicken Pluckers mod for RimWorld 1.1 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1133691528
[img]https://i.imgur.com/GYswkZ7.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/DoomFactions
--- Original Description --- Adds the Union Aerospace Corporation and Space Marine factions in the game. (Non-Hostile) Also contains DOOM 2016 weapons and sounds
The UAC brings plenty of their products very cheap for sale to the inhabitants of the Rim, but what is their real intentions behind their deployment? Who are the Space Marines?
Note: Not combat extended compatible, guys come on. Please. I'm sorry okay? :((
Credits: Jesus Christ - Died for our sins Odstriman - Textures, lab coat and business suit Viceroy - Weapon sounds, coding Tynan - Coding Shinzy - Coding organization Jecrell - Faction Coding, Chicken coding Sam - Faction Coding Rooki1 - Faction Coding D_unit01 - Original DOOM weapons mod inspiration Orion - Organs coding and art base
